title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Problem-Based Learning Course for Developing Consciousness Level Assessment Apps

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Students can accurately identify and explain three key scales (e.g., Glasgow Coma Scale) for assessing consciousness levels
Students can evaluate pupillary response, reflexes, and respiratory patterns in app-based patient assessment scenarios with 80% accuracy
Students can design prototypes of digital assessment tools applicable to real clinical situations through Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
